sec.title: Portable fire extinguishers
sec.p: Provision shall be made for mounting portable fire extinguishers, protected against heat and mechanical shock and vibration, as follows:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: a location shall be in the immediate vicinity of the operator;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: if there are more than one fire extinguisher location on the rig, they shall be placed on different sides of the rig;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: a location shall be accessible from the ground level or platform, on surface rigs or rigs not equipped with an on-board fire suppression system.

sec.p: This does not apply to underground coal rigs.
